question.title: What are the two main conditions associated with PPCa deposits?

option_a.title: Haemochromatosis
option_a.description: A genetic disorder causing excessive iron accumulation in the body

option_b.title: Primary hyperparathyroidism
option_b.description: A condition where the parathyroid glands produce excess parathyroid hormone

option_c.title: Both haemochromatosis and primary hyperparathyroidism are associated with PPCa deposits
option_c.description: A condition where the parathyroid glands produce excess parathyroid hormone

option_d.title: Haemochromatosis is the only condition associated with PPCa deposits
option_d.description: A genetic disorder causing excessive iron accumulation in the body

correct_option.title: option_a
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
